overview: Tom Leimer arrives to the isle of Gotland, Sweden during the summer in order to find his old love Therese Sandstr√∂m. She has, however, started a new life together with the upper-class-guy Karl von Silberhelm, and wishes no longer to know Tom because of his criminal past. A virus, turning people into living dead, breaks out on the isle. Tom makes his decision to try to rescue Therese - a choice that turns out to be more dangerous than he expected, since each who is infected hungers always for fresh human-flesh.
title: Zombie-City Gotland
